Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back View gallery / Back Tasmania Strahan Waterfront 129762 © Paul Fleming Cradle Mountain Tasmania CR Tourism Tasmania And Jason Charles Hill Tasmania Launceston Seaport 126059 © Tourism Tasmania And Kathrun Leahy Tasmania 14 Night Tasmania Statewide Escape 14 Nights • Car Hire • Sightseeing Overview Inclusions Terms & Conditions Hobart - Strahan - Cradle Mountain - Smithton - Launceston - Scamander - Swansea - Port Arthur - Hobart When travelling the whole of Tasmania, we always recommend a minimum of two weeks. Even then you only scratch the surface of what’s on offer, but this itinerary will allow you to navigate the whole island. Tasmanian Vacations Statewide Escape has been carefully planned to include key iconic areas staying in a range of quality motels, hotels and apartment style rooms with cooking facilities. View more View less 14 nights + car hire & sightseeing from $ 2589 per person share twin. Flights are additional Enquire now Sale Period : until 12 Dec 25 or unless sold out prior Your inclusions 14 Days All Inclusive Car Hire pick up Hobart City 2 Nights at Hotel Grand Chancellor OR Mantra on Collins, Hobart 2 Nights at Strahan Village, Strahan 1 Night at Cradle Mountain Hotel, Cradle Mountain 2 Nights at Tall Timbers Tasmania, Smithton 2 Nights at Hotel Grand Chancellor, Launceston 1 Night at Blue Seas Holiday Villas - Scamander 2 Nights at Swansea Cottages & Lodge Suites, Swansea 1 Night at Port Arthur Motor Inn, Port Arthur 1 Night at Iron Creek Bay Farm Stay – Sorell, near Hobart Bangor Vineyard Shed – Paired Tasting and Lunch Devils at Cradle – Day Keeper Tour Turner Stillhouse - Distillery Tour and Tasting Breakfast Included on one morning of your package National Parks Pass – Allowing Entry into Statewide Parks Price from From $2589 per person, twin share Travel: 01 May - 31 Aug 26 From $3055 per person, twin share Travel: 01 Oct - 21 Dec 25 From $3119 per person, twin share Travel: 01 Sep - 21 Dec 26 From $3169 per person, twin share Travel: 11 Jan-30 Apr 26 NOTE: The itinerary is fully customisable to suit your needs. Please note this itinerary’s accommodation and sightseeing is a suggested itinerary only and the products and prices may differ depending on availability at the time of quote and payment. Terms & Conditions Valid for new bookings to 12 Dec 25 or until sold out • Prices are correct as at 17 Sep 25 • Prices are thereafter subject to change without notice until time of confirmation • Flights are additional. • Prices may vary due to a number of factors including tax and surcharge increases, exchange rate movements and availability • Payment schedule will be advised at time of booking • Some surcharges, closeouts and accommodation restrictions apply • Min/max stays apply • Car hire with Budget Rent a Car is fully inclusive of excess reduction coverage and all fees and charges excluding fuel and any additional counter products or fees. Twin share is based on 2 adults sharing a room, bedding configurations may vary • If additional accommodation is required due to flight schedules this is at customers own expense • Any hotel credits that are unused are not refundable, transferable & can’t be exchanged for cash • Advertised prices are per person based on payment by cash or eftpos. Credit card fees will apply • Amendment and cancellation fees apply • Accommodation ratings are based on House of Travel ratings and are a guide only to the overall quality of the property • Packages are subject to availability • Product is supplied by reputable suppliers with their own terms and conditions • Please ask your House of Travel consultant for full details.
